com.thesonofthom.tools

Class BufferMap.ComplexField<E extends BufferMap>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.thesonofthom.tools.BufferMap.AbstractField
      • com.thesonofthom.tools.BufferMap.ComplexField<E>
  • Type Parameters:
    E - the class type of the field
    Enclosing class:
    BufferMap

    public class BufferMap.ComplexField<E extends BufferMap>
extends BufferMap.AbstractField
    This class is for specifying fields that themselves are complex structures that contain other fields

    • Constructor Detail

      • BufferMap.ComplexField

        public BufferMap.ComplexField(java.lang.String name,
                      java.lang.Class<E> classType,
                      java.lang.Object... additionalParameters)
        Constructor. Using the class type and additional Parameters specified, uses Java reflection to build an instance of the map object. Reflection is used to eliminate the need for the user to have to manually create it themselves when defining this field. Also, it is needed for ComplexArrayField to be able to dynamically create an array of objects based on the sizes specifid
        Parameters:
        name - - name of the field
        classType - - BufferMap class that will be a sub map of this map
        additionalParameters - - this MUST contain a list of parameters that are in the signature of one of the constructors in classType. Otherwise an Exception will be thrown For example, if the constructor is: E(BufferMap parent, boolean param0), additionalParameters will be 1 element long and will contain a Boolean
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if no constructors were found that match the format:

        public E(BufferMap parent, additionalParameters)

        See Also:
        BufferMap.ComplexArrayField

        protected java.lang.String getFieldSpecificInfo()
